title: Paladin's Eden
alternative_title: Eden of the Holy Knight ; Eden of the Paladin; Eden Paladin ; Eden và Chàng Kỵ Sĩ ; El Edén del Paladín ; Holy Knight's Eden ; Paladin Eden ; Éden do Paladino ; Читать Эдем паладина ; 성기사의 에덴 ;
status: Eden of the Holy Knight ; Eden of the Paladin; Eden Paladin ; Eden và Chàng Kỵ Sĩ ; El Edén del Paladín ; Holy Knight's Eden ; Paladin Eden ; Éden do Paladino ; Читать Эдем паладина ; 성기사의 에덴 ;
description:
Description :
        Fake priest Eden makes a living giving fake evangelism to villagers and receiving donations. While scamming like any other day, he found an expensive pendant in a villager's room and ended up stealing it... That night, Eden had a dream in which he was violated, but couldn't remember it, and then received strange looks from the villagers. For a moment, while he was confused by memories that seemed out of sync, someone came to town looking for the pendant's whereabouts...+
